title: What does it cost to book the band?
content: Cost depends a lot on a few factors like: amount of time you want the band playing, travel distance, and special request songs if any. Send us a message and we'd love to coordinate with you to get a specific price for your specific events needs.

title: What kinds of music do you play?
content: We primarily play jazz standards from the Great American Songbook as well as some other jazz tunes that we enjoy. We also have some original compositions and more modern songs that we throw in as the occasion demands.

title: What kind of music and sound equipment can the band provide for my event?
content: We provide all the instruments, obviously, but we can also provide a PA and microphones as needed for announcements and MC needs. Drop us a message for more details about equipment needs for your event.

title: If I wanted a singer or another instrument, do you guys work with other musicians too?
content: We do! While we are a jazz trio, we have a number of local musicians that we enjoy working with and can bring on as the occasion requires. Let us know what you're thinking for your event and we can try to accommodate!
